quote: It made sense, Amanda decided. People thrived on the misfortunes of others: her mother was the perfect example of that. Can't see a car accident, she thought, for wanting to climb inside and join in.
quote_letters: IT MADE SENSE AMANDA DECIDED PEOPLE THRIVED ON THE MISFORTUNES OF OTHERS HER MOTHER WAS THE PERFECT EXAMPLE OF THAT CANT SEE A CAR ACCIDENT SHE THOUGHT FOR WANTING TO CLIMB INSIDE AND JOIN IN
